title: Minecraft 1.4版更新记录——（纯翻译）
author: Hetairoi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Hetairoi 于 2011-4-1 13:10 编辑 


1.4版增加的新成员：

狼
非主动攻击型群体
出现在任何难度
未被驯服的狼在被攻击之后会还击，包括和平难度
有攻击性的狼眼睛是红的
可用不定数量的骨头来驯化
右键点击驯服的狼的身体来让他们坐下
狼的尾巴表示它们的生命值状态，尾巴翘的越高越健康
从水里出来会甩掉身上的水
用食物右键点击狼的头部可以喂给它们来加血
离开它们太远会使它们瞬移到你附近

甜饼
加一半血
可以8个一组堆叠
用可可豆和小麦制作
一做出来就是8个
ID是357

可可豆
用来和小麦一起制作甜饼
可在地牢里找到

Steve Co. Supply Chest/Locked Chest
用地形生成器制作，方法类似于生成南瓜
打开后就是一个在线商店(总数超过10000会有发飚的危险!)
有微光
ID是95

新的logo图(见上)

统计和成就系统
尚未完成，待更新

1.4版的更改和新功能：

从床上醒来或者离开一张床将成为你的重生点
如果那张床被破坏就会重生点会恢复为默认的

绵羊现在会有粉红和褐色的羊毛

Shift键可让你在梯子上停下

水流比以前更强

蜘蛛和狼不能踩踏庄稼

默认物品键现在是 E

原文来自：
http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=1020&t=253722

New stuff in 1.4

Wolves
Passive-aggressive mobs
Spawns on all difficulties
Untamed wolves attacks when attacked, even in Peaceful
Aggressive wolves have red eyes
Tame-able with random amount of bones
Right clicking tamed wolves bodies makes them sit
Wolfs tail is a indicator of it's health, higher tail = higher health
Shakes off water when it gets out of water
Right clicking on tamed wolves heads with food heals them
Being too far away will make them teleport to you
Cookies
Heals half a heart
Stackable to 8
Crafted with cacao beans and wheat
When crafted it'll be a stack of 8
ID of this item is 357
Cacao Beans
Used to craft cookies, together with wheat
Can be found in dungeons
Steve Co. Supply Chest/Locked Chest
Created by the terrain generator, similar to how it spawns pumpkins
Refers you to an online shop when you try to open them (EPILEPTIC DANGER ON AMOUNT OVER 10000!)
They have a weak glow
ID of this block is 95
New Minecraft logo (See top of this page)
Infrastructure for stats and achievement
I.E. NOT DONE, fully implemented in later update

Changes/Features in 1.4

Waking up in a bed or leaving a bed sets you spawn point
Your spawn point will be reset to default if the bed gets destroyed
Sheep can now spawn with pink or brown wool
Shift now also holds you still on ladders
Water currents are now stronger than before
Spiders and wolves can't trample crops
Default inventory key is now E
